==== Topic ====
'''MythTV and Ubuntu'''

David Liana of the NY Ubuntu LoCo team will be presenting many features
of MythTV. MythTV is a Free Open Source digital video recorder (DVR)
project distributed under the terms of the GNU GPL. It has been under
heavy development since 2002, and now contains most features one would
expect from a good DVR (and many new ones that you soon won't be able to
live without.)

Details:
* '''address''':<<BR>>
 BARNES & NOBLE @ RIT Bookstore<<BR>>
 100 Park Point Drive<<BR>>
 Rochester,  NY 14623<<BR>>
 (at the corner of John Street and Jefferson Road in Henrietta)
* '''date''': March 5th, 2009
* '''time''': 7pm until 9pm
* '''room''': Upstairs group meeting room -- this room is a semi-private glass window room upstairs
* '''amenities''': free wireless, cafe (food is allowed in the meeting room), a very nice computer book section and IT text books
